snippet: By using Research In Motion's exclusive data network, the BlackBerry Messenger service, or BBM, has long allowed its users to circumvent texting charges from their wireless carriers. On Monday, RIM added dodging voice charges to BBM's list of...
abstract: By using Research In Motion's exclusive data network, the BlackBerry Messenger service, or BBM, has long allowed its users to circumvent texting charges from their wireless carriers. On Monday, RIM added dodging voice charges to BBM's list of features.

headline.main: BlackBerry Phones Get Free Calls Over Wi-Fi
